column5: Hi Fellow members,  I just bought a Hobie Kayak and would like some suggestions regarding where can I fish for Silver Bass within one and half hours within Toronto area.  Thanks in advance!

Thames river in Tilbury. Ok irs 3.5 hours from Toronto but it's a nice calm river off of lake st Clair. Silver bass galore mixed in with a bunch of other stuff. Good luck! Otherwise try the Holland river around bradford great sheltered paddling there

With all the game fish we have at our beckoned call why Silver Bass may I ask? When they are on the bite not really challenging. Good to eat that day or the next at the most. Then they are fertilizer. Never freeze them, they go off.
The Pickering generating station????? Watch the weather though.
